text: Shinko suru mono yo, anata gata ga yotta toki wa, jibun no iu koto ga rikai dekiru yo ni naru made, reihai ni chikadzuite wa naranai. Mata dai kitana no toki mo, tabiji ni aru mono o nozoki, zenshin o awa-yoku shita nochidenakereba naranai.
